menu.name: Classic Beef Burger
menu.description: Savor the rich flavors of our classic beef burger featuring a perfectly seasoned juicy beef patty layered with crisp lettuce, ripe tomato slices, tangy pickles, and drizzled with our special house sauce, all sandwiched between a lightly toasted sesame seed bun.

menu.name: Chicken Avocado Burger
menu.description: Experience a burst of flavors with our chicken avocado burger. Grilled chicken breast meets the creamy goodness of fresh avocado, crispy bacon, and crisp lettuce, all complemented by a zesty aioli, served on a wholesome whole grain bun.

menu.name: Veggie Supreme Burger
menu.description: Indulge in a flavorful experience with our Veggie Supreme Burger. A mouthwatering vegetarian patty is paired with a medley of roasted vegetables, creamy hummus, fresh spinach, and savory feta cheese, all nestled on a wholesome multigrain bun.
